name: Airway Defence v0.0.2
description:
Airway Defence v0.0.2

(52.4mb Download)

Hello and welcome to my first project, it is a WIP while i am studying at Uni. If you could kindly leave a comment with suggestions perhaps to the road map or bugs that you have encountered. all your feedback is greatly appreciated!

Race against time and shoot down targets in this crazy flight blitz where you encounter balloons and need to blow up as many as possible to gain the highest score.

Controls

(NOTE - This game was developed for joystick controls initially)

W, S Pitch

A, D Roll

E, Q - Yaw

R,F Throttle

Left Mouse Click - Machine Gun

Right Mouse Click - Rockets

v0.0.2
